title: Patch 5.13 release date
body: Hi guys I just wanted to know when is patch 5.13 coming out

replies.body: Thank you, I was also wondering.

Patches are usually released every 2 weeks. Patch 5.12 was last Thursday so it's likely patch 5.13 will be next Thursday. However if there's maintenance on a server on the same week a patch is planned to be released it can affect the date the patch is released, usually just by a day or two.
